User Identity Verification:

In order to maintain a safe and trusted environment for our users, we require trainers to provide certain personal information and verify their identity. As part of the application process, you will be requested to submit your identification documents, such as an ID card or passport, as well as any other relevant proof required for verification purposes. By agreeing to these terms, you acknowledge and consent to the collection, storage, and processing of your personal information for the purpose of identity verification.

Protection of Customer Identity:

We prioritize the privacy and confidentiality of our users, including the customers who avail of your training services. As a trainer, you are expected to respect and protect the identity of your customers at all times. This means that you should refrain from sharing or disclosing any personal information, such as names, contact details, or any other identifying information, without the explicit consent of the customer. Any violation of this provision may result in immediate termination of your account and legal action if necessary.

Compliance with Terms:

By applying to become a trainer in our application, you agree to abide by all the terms and conditions outlined herein, as well as any other policies and guidelines set forth by our platform. Failure to comply with these terms, including but not limited to engaging in fraudulent activities, misrepresentation, harassment, or any other violation deemed unacceptable, may result in the suspension or permanent banning of your account, without prior notice.

We reserve the right to modify or update these terms and conditions at any time, and it is your responsibility to review them periodically. By continuing to use our platform as a trainer, you acknowledge and agree to be bound by any such changes. Should you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms, please contact our support team for further assistance.

Please indicate your acceptance of these terms and conditions by submitting your application.
